content.question: Which of the following is true of the cabinet in both Mexico and Nigeria?

choices.label: The courts must review all cabinet member nominations by the executive.
The legislature must approve cabinet members nominated by the executive.
Cabinet members must be members of the legislature.
The cabinet is solely accountable to the executive branch.

content.answer: The legislature must approve cabinet members nominated by the executive.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
